backend/main.mo: Actor managing player stress, scene state, progression flags, save spots, and door barricade logic with getters and mutators.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping high-level game features to source files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of various frontend game, UI, and system files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layer defining OKLCH color variables and dark‑mode industrial theme tokens for global styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: App root applying dark theme via ThemeProvider and rendering GameView.
frontend/src/game/Audio/audioSettingsSto: Zustand store persisting audio volume and mute settings.
Hook generating proximity‑based tension audio using Web Audio with distance and mouth‑reveal intensity scaling.
frontend/src/game/Dialogue/DialogueConte: Dialogue provider managing queued lines, visibility, and timed progression.
frontend/src/game/Dialogue/scriptedLines: Static collection of predefined enemy threat lines.
frontend/src/game/Enemies/GreenHood/gree: Implements a React AI hook that sets GreenHood enemy states based on player distance and triggers dialogue during chase events.
frontend/src/game/Enemies/GreenHood/Gree: Enemy entity handling position updates, hood state, chase speed, and AI‑driven movement.
3D model of the Green Hood with body, hood, glowing eyes, and optional revealed mouth with teeth.
frontend/src/game/Gameplay/hoodFallMecha: Defines a hood‑fall reaction mechanic with look‑direction checks, timing, and stress penalties.
frontend/src/game/GameView.tsx: Sets up the main game view with canvas rendering, scene components, and UI wrapped in a dialogue provider.
frontend/src/game/Input/useInputMode.ts: Determines input mode (touch or keyboard/mouse) and routes movement, look, and interaction inputs accordingly.
frontend/src/game/Input/useKeyboardMouse: Captures keyboard and mouse movement to produce movement vectors, look deltas, and interact state.
frontend/src/game/Input/useTouchLook.ts: Tracks touch movement on the screen’s right half to generate look deltas for touch devices.
frontend/src/game/Player/PlayerControlle: Updates camera movement and rotation from input and syncs the player’s position to global state each frame.
frontend/src/game/Scenes/SceneDirector.t: Handles scene-based scripted events, triggering intro dialogue after a delay.
frontend/src/game/State/usePlayerState.t: Manages persistent player state via backend actor calls and exposes setters for stress, scene, items, and position.
frontend/src/game/World/FacilityWorld.ts: Builds the 3D facility environment with lighting, rooms, interactable objects, and the GreenHood entity.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the user’s identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, including loading, login, logout, and status management.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching player state and updating the player's stress value through the actor interface.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets global Tailwind and custom CSS variables, themes, and utility classes for the app's industrial‑horror visual style.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentity providers and loads global styles.
Renders a touch‑friendly interact button that briefly triggers an interaction input.
Displays an interaction prompt when available, currently using placeholder logic.
Implements a touch joystick that tracks finger movement and updates movement input accordingly.
frontend/src/ui/Dialogue/DialogueBox.tsx: Shows stylized dialogue text at the bottom of the screen when a dialogue line is active.
frontend/src/ui/Hud/HudShell.tsx: Composes all HUD elements including stress indicator, mobile controls, prompts, overlays, and settings panel.
frontend/src/ui/Hud/StressIndicator.tsx: Displays the player's stress percentage with dynamic color coding and a progress bar.
frontend/src/ui/Overlays/FadeToBlack.tsx: Fades the screen to black over time when activated.
frontend/src/ui/Overlays/HoodVignetteOve: Renders a vignette overlay texture with blend effects for atmosphere.
frontend/src/ui/Settings/SettingsPanel.t: Shows a modal settings panel allowing control of audio volume and mute state.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind config enabling dark mode, custom OKLCH-based color system, extended typography, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing a 3D first-person horror game with mobile controls, dialogue UI, core mechanics, required images, and existing feature definitions.
